response.scenario: An anonymous hacker group takes control of a popular social media platform's algorithms, pushing illegal online gambling promotions disguised as free game credits to millions of teenagers worldwide. Parents find themselves with drained bank accounts and crippled credit scores, while young victims grapple with psychological trauma from aggressive gambling addictions, leading to increased rates of underage financial crimes and family turmoil across affected communities.
